桒字的基本解释

桒
sāng
古同“桑”。

桒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sāng］
［《廣韻》息郎切，平唐，心。］
亦作“桒1”。
(1)木名。落叶乔木。叶可饲蚕，果可食用和酿酒；木材可制器具，树皮可造纸。叶、果、枝、根、皮皆可入药。
(2)桑叶。
(3)采桑。
(4)指蚕桑之事。
(5)古地名。故址在今河南省灵宝县北。参阅闻一多《古典新义·释桑》。
(6)姓。汉代有桑弘羊。

桒字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　桒； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页526第04
【正字通】俗桑字。

桒
Basic explanation of words
桒
sāng
Ancient with "Sang".
桒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sāng］
["Guangyun" Xilangqie, Ping Tang, Heart. ]
Also known as "桒1".
(1) Wooden name. Deciduous trees. The leaves can feed silkworms, the fruit can be edible and make wine; the wood can be used to make utensils, and the bark can be used to make paper. Leaves, fruits, branches, roots and skins can all be used as medicine.
(2) Mulberry leaves.
(3) Picking mulberry.
(4) Refers to sericulture.
(5) Ancient place names. The former site was in the north of Lingbao County, Henan Province. See Wen Yiduo's "Classical New Meanings · Shisang".
(6) Last name. There were Sanghong sheep in the Han Dynasty.
桒
